schema.name: Budibase-File-Repeater
schema.description: A repeater for file entries generated with Budibase File Upload.
schema.info: Created by chungchunwang on GitHub at: https://github.com/chungchunwang/Budibase-File-Repeater. You can find detailed instructions there. Please report any issues or feature requests to the GitHub repo (or perhaps star!).
